analysis.description:
CrystalAirdropGame.endMiniGame (/unique_chucks/8/0x5b813a2f4b58183d270975ab60700740af00a3c9.sol#186-204) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(minigames[miniGameId].ended == false && (minigames[miniGameId].endTime <= now))

CrystalAirdropGame.endMiniGame (/unique_chucks/8/0x5b813a2f4b58183d270975ab60700740af00a3c9.sol#186-204) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(minigames[miniGameId].ended == false && (minigames[miniGameId].endTime <= now))
CrystalAirdropGame.joinMiniGame (/unique_chucks/8/0x5b813a2f4b58183d270975ab60700740af00a3c9.sol#206-246) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(now >= minigames[miniGameId].startTime && minigames[miniGameId].ended == false)
	- minigames[miniGameId].playerWin == 0x0
